channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Searchers in helicopters and on horseback comb Texas flood debris for missing people
item.description: Crews are using backhoes and their bare hands to dig through piles of debris that stretch for miles in the search for more than 160 people believed to be missing in the flash floods that laid waste to Texas Hill Country.

item.title: Focus on first respondersâ€™ mental health grows as death toll rises in flood-ravaged Texas
How Americans think the government should respond to natural disasters, according to recent polls
